issue.title: [Java] Add documentation to all classes and enable checkstyle for class javadocs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4741](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4741). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is likely a big issue.  So it might pay to create subtasks for different modules to add javadoc then do one final cleanup for enabling check-style.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4741?focusedCommentId=16849985) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4374
